description: This is an inactive anti-fungicidal hack. It is a bootleg device, made by disabling and replacing the grenade in any grenade containing hack, with a handmade gas grenade deadly to fungus. Use this item to reprogram and activate the anti-fungicidal hack.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the targeting matrix is reprogrammed successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: The anti-fungicidal hack flies from your hand and surveys the area, looking for fungus to destroy!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the anti-fungicidal hack; put on a mask!

description: An automated kamikaze drone, this fist-sized robot appears to have a homemade anti-fungicidal grenade inside.
A broken anti-fungicidal hack. It seems intact, only shutdown from lack of a new gas canister. Maybe if the spent canister were replaced, it would work again.
